data.text:
Silapathar Town College Silapathar, in Dhemaji district of Assam, offers undergraduate courses in Arts discipline.

Silapathar Town College

Silapathar Town College, located at Silapathar, in Dhemaji district of Assam, is a self-financing co-educational institute. The college was founded in 1994 to facilitate need-based higher education for the people of Silapathar and its nearby areas. Silapathar Town College is affiliated to Dibrugarh University. The college is well-equipped with basic amenities within a nice and composed campus. The college offers several undergraduate courses in Arts faculty. Besides, the college runs higher secondary courses in these arts subjects.

Affiliated to: Dibrugarh University

Courses:

Undergraduate:

The college offers the following undergraduate course:

â€¢ B A

Eligibility:

Undergraduate:

Candidates who have passed the intermediate/10+2 level examination of AHSEC/CBSE, recognized by the State Govt. of Assam, in any discipline are eligible for BA course offered here.

Admission Procedure:

Undergraduate:

Admission of the selected candidates is done on the basis of percentage of marks obtained by them in the 10+2 level and as per the norms of Dibrugarh University.

Facilities:

Library

Laboratories

Computer Centre

Co-curricular Activities
